summary: Two sisters find out the existence of their long-lost mother, but the younger cannot take the truth of being abandoned as a child.
cast: Setsuko Hara|Ineko Arima|Chishû Ryû|Isuzu Yamada|Teiji Takahashi|Masami Taura|Haruko Sugimura|Sô Yamamura|Kinzô Shin|Kamatari Fujiwara|Nobuo Nakamura|Seiji Miyaguchi|Junji Masuda|Eiko Miyoshi|Teruko Nagaoka|Mutsuko Sakura|Fujio Suga|Tsûsai Sugawara|Haruo Tanaka|Kumeko Urabe|Kazuko Yamamoto
title: Crepúsculo en Tokio
